reviews.review_msg: I took 100200 level Chinese courses with her, and she is amazing. She takes care of her students and encourages them to be better. Because the classes are quite small, we can chat with her a lot like a friend. You just need to memorize a few vocabs and you're good. The listening portion of the tests are a bit hard, but regardless, an easy A.

Had for 180 181 280 281. Teaches with even balance between reading+speaking. Tough language, so you need to put in the time. Completely fair marker; I got a B but was taking 6 courses my first semester while working, would have gotten an A or higher otherwise. Clear, informative and interactive lectures. 2 cheap texts for each level, with workbook
